testcase.classname: Validate checkout flow on SwagLabs page
testcase.name: Validate checkout flow
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to SauceLab demo page Chrome...............................passed When type the username standard_user with password secret_sauce.............passed And press the login button..................................................passed And sort products from most expensive to cheapest...........................passed And add product to the cart.................................................passed And add product to the cart.................................................passed And checkout information....................................................passed Then finish checkout........................................................passed
